entry.title: adnan417/pr-report-generator: PR Report Generator is a lightweight Node.js tool that automates the generation of weekly Pull Request (PR) summary reports across multiple GitHub repositories. It fetches PR insights from any number of repositories, organizes them by module or project area, and produces a clean, ready-to-share Word document (.docx format).
entry.content: PR Report Generator is a lightweight Node.js tool that automates the generation of weekly Pull Request (PR) summary reports across multiple GitHub repositories. It fetches PR insights from any number of repositories, organizes them by module or project area, and produces a clean, ready-to-share Word document (.docx format).

entry.title: Noorhan-Yaseen/Smart-Document-Summarizer: The Smart Document Summarizer is a web-based application that allows users to upload text documents or paste raw text content for automatic summarization. Built using Flask, a lightweight Python web framework, and the BART Large CNN model from Hugging Face's Transformers library, this tool generates concise, easy-to-read summaries of large document
entry.content: The Smart Document Summarizer is a web-based application that allows users to upload text documents or paste raw text content for automatic summarization. Built using Flask, a lightweight Python web framework, and the BART Large CNN model from Hugging Face's Transformers library, this tool generates concise, easy-to-read summaries of large document
